vote.title: Authorize a five-year service price agreement for the maintenance and repair of the city-owned electrical transmission substations at the Southside Wastewater Treatment Plant and the Eastside Water Treatment Plant for the Dallas Water Utilities Department - Energy EPC Solutions, LLC dba S&B Services, most advantageous proposer of three - Estimated amount of $3,328,705.18 - Financing:  Dallas Water Utilities Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
